typeSystemDescription.name: Token Occurrance Linguistic Type
typeSystemDescription.description:
This is the linguistic type of Token Occurrances, which is used to represent the number of word tokens occurring with the same frequency in a document. It extends the AnnotationBase Type and has a feature of nOccurranceDouble and nTokensDouble. It does not extend the Annotation type, so it has no begin or end features.
Dependency: Linguistic_type: Token

featureDescription.name: wordString
featureDescription.description: The spelling of the word type.
